mapper.insert: insert into ecs_admin (admin_id, admin_name, admin_sex, usergroup_id, admin_status, location, address, password, admin_phone, remark) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usergroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_admin set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_sex = #{adminSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usergroup_id = #{usergroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_status = #{adminStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_phone = #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, admin_sex, usergroup_id, admin_status, location, address, password, admin_phone, remark from ecs_admin where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select admin_id, admin_name, admin_sex, usergroup_id, admin_status, location, address, password, admin_phone, remark from ecs_admin
